name: Nightmare.exe
description:
In this game, a rogue A.I takes control of your PC.

I am very early in development. 

The only reason I am uploading this is to show of the concept.

To play the game YOU WILL NEED to keep the install directory open.

(Documents\SoulCoreGames\Nightmare)

Please read the disclaimer below:

This game will not harm your computer in any way.
It will not perform malicious activities, but I will move your mouse, control your keyboard, create files and change your desktop background.
You have been warned.
